Is this the right behavior of that:

host: www.netarkivet.dk/.... redirects all requests to netarkivet.dk/.....

crawler requests (via normal link): www.netarkivet.dk/test.pdf -> gets a 
302 Location: netarkivet.dk/test.pdf

netarkivet.dk/test.pdf is not fecthed because it is allready seen 
(thinks heritrix) ?

Perhaps strip-rules should not be effective on requests that return 
301/302 but only on objects that returned 20x

best
